title: A Weapon Without A Mission: U.S. Developing Boost-Glide Missile
teaser: The U.S. military has been working on a weapon that could strike remote targets quickly. NPR's Arun Rath talks with James Acton of the Carnegie Endowment for International Peace about the technology.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
